meanings.definition: A triangle with no equal sides.
meanings.sent1: I learned about scaleni in math class.
meanings.sent2: The scaleni shape looked unique compared to the other triangles.
meanings.sent3: The scaleni triangle stood out in the geometric shapes puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her hair formed a scaleni shape as she twirled it around her finger.
meanings.sent5: The scaleni triangle's angles were all different sizes.

meanings.sent1: The scaleni muscle helps with neck movements.
meanings.sent2: He felt a strain in his scaleni after sleeping in an awkward position.
meanings.sent3: The scaleni muscle tensed up when he heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: Her scaleni muscle felt tight from stress.
meanings.sent5: The scaleni muscle can get sore after a long day of work.
